Class SolarisSerial.SolarisSerialCheckStatusThread

java.lang.Object

      com.sun.comm.SolarisSerial.SolarisSerialCheckStatusThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
SolarisSerial
public class SolarisSerial.SolarisSerialCheckStatusThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This thread parallels native code and is used to check port status and send events at the java layer.

Version:
1.2, 06/04/04
